name: [Prototype] Project BlockchainZ
description:
WELCOME TO [PROTOTYPE] PROJECT BLOCKCHAINZ

Project BlockChainZ is a Third Person Shooter video game mixed with Real Time Tactics Mechanics in a post-apocalyptic world where the survival of the human kind depends on you.


"How to save the world" Project BlockChainZ: Gameflow

You must defend the bunker against the hordes of zombies and the attacks of the raiders on a fixed map where you'll fight with the help of your troops and traps until the reinforcements arrive.

The zombies are very resistant, so you will need a type of ammo called BlockchainZ, hidden in Raiders's Storages. You must spoil it from them. The more B-Z Ammo you spoil, the more Raiders will attack you.

Bloody Features
  • Worldmap base and army management.
  • Third Person Shooter with huge battles.
  • Tactical view to manage your troops across the battle.
  • Realtime tactics to command your troops.
  • Deploy defensive elements to direct the action where you want.
  • RPG character level improvement.


Be a soldier in our first downloadable prototype. Get ready for the battle! 

Join us in our  Official Discord Server.
